question: Bimbisara sent his royal physician Jivaka to Ujjain when which of the following kings had jaundice?
explanation: Bimbisara sent his royal physician Jivaka to Ujjain when Pradyota had jaundice, along Dakshinapatha to Avanti. Earlier Bimbisara had rivalry with Avantiâ€™s king Pradyota but later they became friends.
